Class DataFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataFormat

  • public class DataFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    DataFormat object is responsible for storing game data in format convenient to file operations. It includes methods which help with parsing data both from and to file.
    Author:
    Patryk

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataFormat(java.lang.String username, int totalTime, int blowTime, int totalScore)
      Constructor initialized with default properties data and current date.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds records to LinkedList.
      java.lang.String createRecord()
      Creates and returns formated record of game data.
      java.lang.String[] returnBestScore()
      Takes LinkedList of records, chooses record with best score and returns it as a list of Strings.
      void updateData(java.lang.String username, int totalTime, int blowTime, int totalScore)
      Updates data object to be compatible with current data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataFormat

        public DataFormat(java.lang.String username,
                  int totalTime,
                  int blowTime,
                  int totalScore)
        Constructor initialized with default properties data and current date.
        Parameters:
        username - - nickname of player
        totalTime - - total time of playing
        blowTime - - total summed time of player blowing
        totalScore - - total score of points

    • Method Detail

      • updateData

        public void updateData(java.lang.String username,
                       int totalTime,
                       int blowTime,
                       int totalScore)
        Updates data object to be compatible with current data.
        Parameters:
        username - - nickname of player
        totalTime - - total time of playing
        blowTime - - total summed time of player blowing
        totalScore - - total score of points

      • createRecord

        public java.lang.String createRecord()
        Creates and returns formated record of game data. Format: "USERNAME, TOTALSCORE, BLOWTIME, TOTALTIME, DATE;"
        Returns:
        record

      • addReadRecord

        public void addReadRecord(java.lang.String record)
        Adds records to LinkedList.
        Parameters:
        record - - data record

      • returnBestScore

        public java.lang.String[] returnBestScore()
        Takes LinkedList of records, chooses record with best score and returns it as a list of Strings. Record has format (String[4]): | [0]User name | [1]Score | [2]Blow Time | [3]Total time | [4]Date |
        Returns:
        - record with the highest score
